name: Escape Machine City
description:
Can you escape Machine City?

- A next level escape game with stunning 3D graphics and visual effects!
- 15 beautiful levels to explore! First 8 levels are available free of charge!
- Dozens of challenging quests and original puzzles!
- An escape game you will remember!

An imminent destruction is facing the town, and you are the only one left behind...
Discover a strangely unique machine world that is trapped on a high cliff in a desolated wasteland.
If you think you have what it takes to escape Machine City then go on and download this game now!
